edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GUI
extends java.awt.Canvas
    This class creates the window on which the game is to be played and creates the window the player inputs save/loading from.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  GUI.componentListener
      This class creates a aciton listener so when the player its enter one the box for saving/loading it takes the information and destroys the window.

      This method crates a keylistener so player can input commands

      • displayGrid

        public void displayGrid(int lives,
               int ammo,
               int invuln,
               int level,
               boolean debug,
               boolean hard)
        Displays the grid to the player and takes the user input.
        Parameters:
        lives - lives of the player
        ammo - ammo the player currently has.
        invuln - how many steps of invulnerability.
        level - what level the player is on.
        debug - boolean value for debug.
        hard - boolean value for hard mode.

        Parameters:
        lives - lives of the player
        ammo - ammo the player currently has.
        invuln - how many steps of invulnerability.
        level - what level the player is on.

        public SpyVsNinja.playerAct menu(boolean debug)
        This method keeps track of the user action during the menu. keeps track of where they are in the menu and what action they want to perform such as toggling debug mode or starting a new game.
        Parameters:
        debug - boolean value for debug.
        Returns:
        The action the player wants to happen.
